#id=1
#text=As I walked in through the sliding glass door I could feel my excitement rising up in my body .
#id=2
#text=You see I had just entered the airport and this was my first time ever flying !
#id=3
#text=I went over to the self check in with my mom and typed in my ticket number and checked my bag .
#id=4
#text=After receiving my tickets I went down to the dreaded security check point .
#id=5
#text=To my surprise it was not as bad as I had thought .
#id=6
#text=Even though the line was long it seemed to move quickly .
#id=7
#text=I showed my ticket and ID to the agent and then kind of followed what everyone else was doing .
#id=8
#text=I grabbed a bin and took off my shoes and put my book bag on the rolling belt as well .
#id=9
#text=I emptied all my pockets and walked through the metal detector .
#text=To my surprise it did not beep , but my mom was not so lucky .
#text=She had to get waved by that wand thing and they discovered it was her belt buckle setting it off .
#text=After we grabbed our things and I got a book to read on the flight from a newsstand in the airport .
#text=We found our gate and they called us in groups .
#text=We got in line and handed the attendant our tickets and boarded the plane .
#text=I got the window seat and was super excited of getting to see out the window .
#text=The woman gave us the safety demo and we were off !
#text=I was a little nervous on take off but after that it was smooth sailing .
#text=Two Diet Cokes and three hours later we arrived in Chicago !
